house_listing.house_description: Fannie mae property only 3% down no pmi for first time buyers or 15% for investors, all offers must have pre-approval no exceptions. Property has been completly re-habbed it shows great with new paint, carpet, vinyl etc.. Please fax all offers to angelica suarez 310-952-1195
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Seapoint Realty RE/MAX Seapoint Realty
